attributes.action: Outlaw the use of pineapple on pizza in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pizza is the food of gods, it is the rolls royce of fast food and yet some mock it by adding pineapple.What next, oranges? a 12 inch fruit salad pizza, stop this injustice now!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
